sense.gloss: wound, injury, cut, gash, bruise, scratch, scrape, scar
stain (on one's reputation), disgrace, dishonor, dishonour
fly in the ointment, small flaw in otherwise perfect object, only trouble, only fault

r_ele.r: しんりてきかしぶっけん

sense.gloss: stigmatized property, real estate where a crime, death, etc. has occurred

sdata.j: トムは↑運動↑↓うんどう↓もできるし↑優↑↓やさ↓しいしルックスもまずまず。ただね、マザコンというのが↑玉↑↓たま↓に↑瑕↑↓きず↓なんだよね。
sdata.e: Tom is able to work out, kind hearted and decent looking, but this is all put to waste by his so called 'mother complex'.
